title: where the fuq is my mystery skin rito ?
body: its way too over 16:59 AEST , and i did facebook thing age ago. GIVE IT TO ME NOW

replies.body: Let me try to explain something to you. Quite simply, it takes time. It's not like they can just throw a switch and it goes out to pretty much EVERY SINGLE PLAYER  instantaneously, it doesn't work that way. It can actually take up to a few days before some people get it. 16:59 AEST is the time they set it in motion, not necessarily the time you would receive it.

well, then why some ppl already received it and some ppl like me still waiting for it.

They clearly stated that they gonna give to us around 5 pm, but they didnt talk bout it would take longer for some ppl.

AND plz dont act like ur working for rito . it makes me laugh a lot when some random guy like u acts like knows everything about rito system
Dude,they are just trying to help lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Sulbatamol,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Uz2Lfygs,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-07-02T08:25:37.437+0000)
 
> AND plz dont act like ur working for rito . it makes me laugh a lot when some random guy like u acts like knows everything about rito system

Lol @ this, not all of the player base acts like children who cannot understand regular type-talk. Some people resolve things maturely, not only Riot people... lol

> [{quoted}](name=Sulbatamol,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Uz2Lfygs,comment-id=0001000000030000,timestamp=2015-07-02T11:18:05.188+0000)
>
> well i didnt receive my fking thing u fucking cunt fuck off

tell people who care.... hint, support?

Just a little update:
If you haven't already seen it, there's a [thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/ByvUQ776-pool-party-rewards-distribution-on-going) made by Cochese concerning the distribution of Pool Party Rewards. It should be updated when the distribution is complete.

> then why some ppl already received it and some ppl like me still waiting for it.

I explained that. Fact is it isn't instantaneous, it would be a lot better if it was but the system needs to go through a list of the entire player base and pick out the people who are actually getting it.

> plz dont act like ur working for rito

I'm not, I'm simply explaining why you might not have received the skin yet because obviously you don't understand.
I know how you feel, I have submitted a ticket to support and still waiting on a response.
